alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Griggs; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:19PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cass, southwestern Traill, Griggs, northern Barnes and Steele Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 519 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Revere to 8 miles south of Pillsbury to near Cummings. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valley City, Mayville, Cooperstown, Portland, Finley, Arthur and Hunter. This includes Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 283 and 309. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern North Dakota.
